title: The Three Little Pigs
short_plot_summary: Three little pigs each build their own house, but only the house made of bricks is strong enough to withstand the huffing and puffing of a big, bad wolf.
explanation: A pig, representing the three main characters who are siblings
A house, symbolizing the houses the pigs build out of straw, sticks, and bricks
Wind, representing the wolf's huffing and puffing to blow the houses down
A wolf, signifying the main antagonist in the story who threatens the pigs
Fire, illustrating the wolf's defeat when he tries to enter the brick house through the chimney and falls into a fire
